divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed the objects coming from the East traveled South West the green object seemed to be follwoing the blue object. The blue object seemed to speed up and climbed or elevated then headed North West all the while it climbed a higher distance. Then the blue object seemed to be follwoing the Green object. The colors of the blue object seem to turn from blue to green then white then red then green again. At this point the 1st green object was no where to be seen. Then the object that was turning different colors climbed so high it was no longer visible. This was seen by 11 sober individuals. This time we were not able to take video or still pictures because objects were to high.
Summary: 2 Lights, Green being followed by a Blue light
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in San Marcos
There were no other sightings in San Marcos on or around October 31st 2010
